title: "Attempting to reconnect" all the time after new patch 7.20
body:
Hello,

just wanted to ask if anyone else is having issues with league after new patch 7.20? I'm experiencing huge lags followed by "Attempting to reconnect" in games even tho my internet and everything else works perfectly fine. What should I do? {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body:
First things first, let's make sure your network is able to get a clear signal to our servers by adjusting your Port Forwarding and DNS settings. If you're unfamiliar with doing this, check out the steps we have in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Be sure to test all of these changes in a custom/practice match.

If those two steps don't seem to help, go ahead and hit the other points in that guide as well. It's always good to cover the basics first, but don't hesitate to let me know if that guide hasn't helped.
